meanings.definition: Skilled or experienced in a particular activity or profession.
meanings.sent1: She is a practised pianist, playing beautifully at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The practised doctor diagnosed the illness quickly.
meanings.sent3: The practised chef accidentally added sugar instead of salt to the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her practised hands moved swiftly, creating a masterpiece in minutes.
meanings.sent5: The practised archer hit the bullseye with every arrow.

meanings.sent1: His practised morning routine included jogging and yoga.
meanings.sent2: The practised singer performed at the local cafe every Friday.
meanings.sent3: The practised student always sat in the same spot in class.
meanings.sent4: Her practised smile never failed to brighten everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The practised gardener watered the plants diligently every evening.
